text: Where's Snoopy getting the money from to go to the Tiger's Head tonight?
She can go where she likes.
So I said I was tired of waiting for the money for my things and she can collect it from the students and have it when it came.
That was a fiver was it?
Presumably they've all got their films.
So they should jolly well be stumping up.
If she's not bothered to collect them
